p: More specifically, for both Chit-H–argan oil and Chit-H–clove oil combinations, the results obtained by the first test ( Table 3) evidenced improved antibacterial activity of the coated PLA films compared with the uncoated films (for both NATIVIA and hot-pressed PLA films) . Even the HA-NATIVIA sample (with 0 log reduction) had higher antibacterial activity against S. aureus ( Table 3) compared with the uncoated NATIVIA film (with negative log reduction, i.e., cell proliferation). In the case of E. coli bacteria, antibacterial effect was observed even for the uncoated NATIVIA films because of the decreased pH by the free lactic acid, which was present in the film ( Table 3).
